ruleToc.chapterName:
text@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();

    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据
let datas1 = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie={{cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "晴天阅读记录",
        "url": base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&key=" + key,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    }
];

const datas2 = [{
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,

        }
    },

        }

    },

        "style": {

    {

        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=2',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "女频精选",
        "url":base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=3',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }

        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    });
    for (let k1 in data[k]) {
        datas.push({
            "title": '༺༴ '+k1+' ༴༻',
            "url": '',
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "推荐排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({

            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({
            "title": "热门排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
            }
}



JSON.stringify(datas);

    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),

                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {

                "style": {

                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45

            });

    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [

            "url": "",
            "style": {

                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();

    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");

}

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');

if (!key) {

	}

# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）
- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

        latest = list[i].select('.fed-list-remarks').text() + '〔' + String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[5-a].textNodes()[0]) + '〕';
        intro = list[i].select('.fed-part-esan').textNodes()[0];
        cover = list[i].select('.fed-list-pics').attr('data-original');
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16('Cover' + Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-part-eone a').attr('href')), cover);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-part-eone a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"));
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.fed-list-item, .fed-deta-info')[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

    '&theme=dongfang','&theme=danmei','&theme=shenghuo','&theme=gedou','&theme=qingxiaoshuo','&theme=xuanyi','&theme=shengui','&theme=zhichang',
    '&theme=teenslove','&theme=mengxi','&theme=zhiyu','&theme=changtiao','&theme=sige','&theme=jiecao','&theme=jianniang','&theme=jingji',

exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Jindu = `{{get('jindu',Get('o'))}}`;
Shuxing = `{{get('shuxing',Get('p'))}}`;
Odfie = `{{get('odfie',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

    '全部',
    '推荐',
    '热门',
    '上架'
];

    'manga',
    'hots',
    'dayup',
    'newss'
];

    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby1[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank1[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  地　　区  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank2 = [
    '韩漫',
    '国漫',
    '日漫',
    '欧美',
    '其他'
];
orderby2 = [
    'kr',
    'cn',
    'jp',
    'ou-mei',
    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',
    '纯爱','系统','重生','冒险','灵异','大女主','剧情','恋爱',
    '玄幻','女神','科幻','魔幻','推理','猎奇','治愈','都市',
    '异形','青春','末日','悬疑','修仙','战斗'
];
link = [
    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

        }

        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover.replace(/\\/g, ''),
                'url': Get('url') + '/manga/' + list[i].manga_code
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pn=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pn=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/latest"},"method":"GET"}');
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.items[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('o'))}}`;
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
path = 'init?platform=android';
url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
if(String(Account).length > 0 && String(source.getLoginHeader()).length > 0) {
    if (!kind) {
        Login();
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    }  
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
    exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
    var signdate = sign() || '未签到';
    cache.put("pica-sign", signdate);
    exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
    path = `users/favourite?s=${Sort}&page={{page}}`;
    header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  主　　题  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('最近更新', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/random`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('随机本子', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('大家都在看')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('大家在看', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('大濕推薦')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('大师推荐', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('那年今天')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('那年今天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('官方都在看')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('官方在看', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=H24&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('24小时', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=D7&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('7天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=D30&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('30天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   var kind = kind.categories;
   for (i in kind) {
       path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI(kind[i].title)}&s=${Sort}`;
       header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
       title = kind[i].title
       title = Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? java.t2s(title) : title;
       url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
       exploreUrl.push(explore(title, url, 1, 0.25, false));
   }
   BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
   for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
      exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
   }
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

<js>
if (!/qyyuapi/.test(baseUrl)) {
    if (!JSON.parse(result).data) {
        path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*)\,\{.*/, '$1');
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        result = java.ajax(url);
    }
    var pages = JSON.parse(result).data.pages.pages;
    var page = JSON.parse(result).data.pages.page;
    var urls = [];
    if (pages > 1 && page == 1) {
        for (i = 2; i <= pages; i++) {
            path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*page=).*/, '$1') + i;
            url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
            urls.push(url);
        }
        urls;
    }
}
</js>

var exploreUrl = [];

if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxfz-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;

O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}

   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));

            Data();

        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list;

                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter_title + '〔' + (/-/.test(list[i].update_time) ? list[i].update_time : String(java.timeFormat(list[i].update_time*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-')) + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': /http/.test(list[i].image) ? list[i].image : (Get('url') + list[i].image),
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].id
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)(-\d-\d-\d)$/, function(match, p1, p2) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + p2;}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.list[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
